articles.title: WATCH: Sen. Elissa Slotkin delivers the Democratic response to Trump's address to Congress - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: Slotkin accused President Donald Trump of driving up costs while pushing for an “unprecedented giveaway to his billionaire friends.” She also said Trump “has not laid out a credible plan” to address rising everyday expenses for Americans.
articles.content: LANSING, Mich. (AP) First-term Michigan Sen. Elissa Slotkin accused President Donald Trump of driving up costs while pushing for an unprecedented giveaway to his billionaire friends in Tuesday night’… [+3225 chars]
